comments.author: LadyRhonwyn.2501
comments.body: You can also not find the cultural armours in the PvE side of things (you can find them with the PvP game type…)

comments.author: Argos.6051
comments.body:
Some items are missing :
There is no pve version of ‘Nightmare Greatsword’ for instance.
I’m not sure, but maybe all exotic dungeon weapons are missing ?
